title: Pulsfire Thresh Error
body: Purchased Pulsefire Thresh select the skin says an error has occured or skin cannot be selected ? skin remains on in champ select gets to game default skin is equipped anyone else having this issue ?

replies.body: I've been intermittently unable to change my skins (on any champ) for the last couple days (it will default to whatever I had selected last and shows all as locked in select). So far as I know Riot are aware and working on a fix for that one, but if your issue is at all different it would be good to know the specifics so I can pass it on :)
